titles.title: Reuben E. Lawson Federal Building Act of 2023
Reuben E. Lawson Federal Building Act of 2023
Reuben E. Lawson Federal Building Act of 2023
Reuben E. Lawson Federal Building Act of 2023
A bill to redesignate the Richard H. Poff Federal Building located at 210 Franklin Road Southwest in Roanoke, Virginia, as the "Reuben E. Lawson Federal Building", and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Carper without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 313.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Environment and Public Works
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

bill.summary:
Reuben E. Lawson Federal Building Act of 2023
This bill redesignates the Richard H. Poff Federal Building located at 210 Franklin Road Southwest in Roanoke, Virginia, as the Reuben E. Lawson Federal Building.
